amendment.description: To address a shortfall in funding for international disaster and famine assistance and for hurricane relief.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3657 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3657 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S3963-3964; text: CR S3963) To address a shortfall in funding for international disaster and famine assistance and for hurricane relief.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3657 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3657 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Leahy.
